summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to 800 MHz emergency radio communication; authorizing the Director of the Department of Information Technology to execute on behalf of the City an Interlocal Agreement between the City of Seattle, City of Tacoma, Eastside Public Safety Communication Agency, King County, Snohomish County Emergency Radio System, and Valley Communications Center for the purpose of interoperable 800 MHz emergency communications within the Puget Sound region; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
